description.value: Regeneration doesn't function while Kas is exposed to direct sunlight.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

+33 vs AC; 2d10+14 damage (crit 34+5d6).

Encounter ✦ Healing

Standard

+31 vs Fortitude; 2d12+14 damage, and the target is weakened (save ends), and Kas regains 297 hit points.

At-Will ✦ Fear, Weapon

Standard

+33 vs AC; 2d10+14 damage (crit 34+5d6), and the target is pushed 5 squares and immobilized (save ends).

Recharge 6

Ranged 5

+31 vs Will; the target is dominated and takes a -2 penalty to saving throws against being dominated (save ends both). Aftereffect: The target is dazed (save ends). Kas can have only one creature dominated at a time.

Recharge 6

Standard

Close burst 1; +31 vs AC; 2d10+17 damage (crit 37+5d6), and the target is blinded (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Minor 1/Round, At-Will

Close burst 5

Targets one enemy; the target is marked until the end of Kas's next turn. If the marked target makes an attack that doesn't include Kas as a target, it takes ongoing 10 necrotic damage (save ends).

Trigger: When kas reduces an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer

Kas spends a healing surge to regain 297 hit points and end all adverse effects currently affecting him.

Encounter ✦ Polymorph

Standard

Sustain Minor; Encounter

The Kas becomes insubstantial and gains fly (hover) 12 until the end of his next turn. Kas cannot attack while in this form and can sustain this form for up to 1 hour.

system.biography:
HP 1190; Bloodied 595
Regeneration 20 (regeneration doesn’t function while Kas is exposed to direct sunlight)
Resist 15 fire, 15 necrotic Vulnerable 10 radiant Immune disease, poison 		Init +20 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 44Fort 41Ref 39Will 41
Speed 7, climb 3 (spider climb)
Ability ScoresStr 26 (+21)
Con 22 (+19)		Dex 20 (+18)
Int 24 (+20)		Wis 19 (+17)
Cha 28 (+22)
Languages Common
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +25, Insight +22, Intimidate +27, Religion +25, Stealth +21Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 27 | Insight 32

Equipment black iron armor +5 plate armor , lifedrinker weapon +5 bastard sword .
